name: The Worldbuilder
description:
Become a rich building tycoon in this turn-based simulation. Buy machines and resources, hire and fire workers and accept breathtaking contracts. There will be different contracts from small houses to big skyscrapers.  

How to play

Use the scene selector in the upper left to jump between the headquarter, the merchant and different contracts. When a contract is selected you can see the details and accept it. Select cards in the lower area to bring them into the selection. By selecting them again you can assign them to any contract. Press next to see your buildings grow.

Disclaimer

This Game is in early development. Many features are still missing and the final gameplay is not yet decided, especially the artwork.
